original_text: But the ark of God had David brought up from Kirjathjearim to the place which David had prepared for it: for he had pitched a tent for it at Jerusalem.
korean_text: 다윗이 전에 예루살렘에서 하나님의 궤를 위하여 장막을 쳐 두었으므로 그 궤는 다윗이 이미 기럇여아림에서부터 그것을 위하여 준비한 곳으로 메어 올렸고

sentences.original_text: had David brought up from Kirjathjearim
to the place which David had prepared for it
for he had pitched a tent for it
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그것을 위해 장막을 쳤기 때문이며
